DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate safety and immunogenicity of a sub-unit Influenza vaccine when administered to adult and elderly subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Immunogenicity of One Dose of an Inactivated Trivalent Sub-unit Influenza Vaccine Administered to Non-elderly Adult and Elderly Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy, adult and elderly volunteers over 18 years Individuals with any serious chronic or acute disease or known or suspected impairment of the immune system.
